description:
This dataset is used to detect the type of fall such as cramp, sitting, etc. and also used for healthcare, sports research.
The columns represent the following
**Activity:**
0: Standing
1: Walking
2: Sitting
3: Falling
4: Cramps
5: Running
**TIME**: Time in seconds.
**SL**: Sound Level in decibels (dB).
**EEG**: Electroencephalogram (EEG) in microvolts (μV).
**BP**: Blood pressure in millimeters of mercury (mmHg).
**HR**: Heart rate in beats per minute (BPM).
**CIRCULATION**: Blood circulation in arbitrary units (AU).
title: sis fall dataset
